name: MIST (43N34S)
description:
My first game made in 9 months that lasts half an hour

You were riding through the forest and than, suddenly, your vehicle brakes, forcing you to disembark and walk further in the mist to seek for help in repairing it and leave this forest once and for all.

[totally not generic plot]
This is my long-run project that i was making for a long time, it lived through the numerous iterations and concept changes and here it is, if this stuff was interesting to play please let me know what exacly is cool and what sucks, i really want to know what you people think of my mess. Thank you.
